items.title: Book Clubbing One of the Season’s Biggest New Releases
items.description: A deep dive into the VIGIL by George Saunders, plus the month's best new mysteries, how audiobooks get made, and more.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for January 28, 2026
items.description: An enchanting bookshop, an undead fox and an entirely dead badger, three women against a cruel empire, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: An Epic Poetic Journey Through the History of the Black Female Figure in Art
items.description: An epic journey through the history of the representation of the Black female figure, and thus, the history of humanity itself.

items.title: 3 Bookish Documentaries You Can Stream Right Now
items.description: In the mood for continued learning? These three bookish documentaries all share an underlying message of hope in difficult moments.

items.title: Road Trips, Bad Vibes, and Cursed Islands: New YA Book Releases for January 28, 2025
items.description: From a road trip through India to a supernatural thriller in a former sundown town, your new YA book releases this week are here!
